title: Help
body: So my main account is in Server LAN and one day I would like to transfer to NA my summoner name is Skywinds in LAN and would it be possible if I could get the same name in NA? If the name is inactive just curiosity

replies.body: If the name is taken on another account then it won't be possible to transfer the name over with you.  You'll instead be prompted to select a new name.  Let me know if you have any questions!
But what if the name is inactive lets say since 2012?
There is a website that shows when league names expire, I suggest checking that out.
